content.title: Scholarship/Stipend to SC Students for ITI/Professional Courses (Swami Vivekanand Scholarship)
content.department: Director, Scheduled Caste Welfare, Government of Gujarat
content.details: The 'Scholarship/Stipend to SC Students for ITI/Professional Courses' scheme is administered by the Director, Scheduled Caste Welfare, Government of Gujarat. Under the scheme, a monthly stipend/scholarship will be given to Scheduled Caste Category students who are studying professional courses in Government or Private Industrial Training Institute (ITI).
benefits: Under the scheme, a monthly stipend of ₹400/- is given to the eligible student.
eligibility: The student should belong to the Scheduled Caste of Gujarat.
The student should be studying in a professional course in a Government or Private Industrial Training Institute (ITI).
The annual family income of the student should be up to ₹6,00,000/- (For Rural & Urban Areas).
documents_required: Income Certificate (Competent Authority) (Form No. 16 required for Govt. Employee)
Caste Certificate from the Competent Authority
First Page of Bank Passbook/Cancelled Cheque
Break Affidavit(If Break Gap is More than One Year)
Death Certificate of Father (If Father not Alive)

faqs.question: Who administers this scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is administered by the Director, Scheduled Caste Welfare, Government of Gujarat.

faqs.question: What is the primary benefit offered under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible students receive a monthly stipend of ₹400/-.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for this scholarship?
faqs.answer: Eligibility criteria include belonging to the Scheduled Caste of Gujarat and being enrolled in a professional course in a Government or Private Industrial Training Institute (ITI).

faqs.question: What are the income criteria for eligibility?
faqs.answer: The annual family income of the student should be up to ₹6,00,000/- (For Rural & Urban Areas).

faqs.question: How can I apply for the benefits of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicants can apply through the Digital Gujarat Portal: https://www.digitalgujarat.gov.in/

faqs.question: Can students pursuing courses in private institutions avail of this scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, students studying in both Government and Private ITIs are eligible for this scheme.

faqs.question: How is the stipend amount disbursed to eligible students?
faqs.answer: Stipend amounts are often disbursed directly to the bank accounts of eligible students.
